thread.section_title: Spex4Less Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.spex4less.com | 6 of 139
thread.title: jim parslow

author: jim parslow
title: jim parslow
text:
I got my prescription wrong when ordering and I got a phone call within a matter of minutes to discuss my order.
They put the prescription right and told me where I had gone wrong.
As it was my first time ordering glasses I really appreciated the help.
Would totally use spex4less in the future, brilliant company.
Also saved me well over 50% of a high street retailer.
